Chap. 19 - Book Sales and Illustrations

     Sale of Books and Periodicals Urged.--Remind our people often of the work that may be done by the sale of our books and the distribution of tracts. Encourage them to sell the periodicals containing the message for this time. Our large books can be sold in Washington and other cities in the East if the canvassers will take up the work courageously.--Lt 21, 1905.
